statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Bol Bol had 26 points and nine rebounds, and No. 13 Oregon beat No. 15 Syracuse 80-65 in the consolation game of the 2K Classic on Friday.

video.headline: Bol Bol dominates Syracuse on his birthday
video.caption: Bol Bol continues his stellar play as he scores 26 points and collects 9 rebounds and Oregon takes down Syracuse 80-65.
video.description: Bol Bol continues his stellar play as he scores 26 points and collects 9 rebounds and Oregon takes down Syracuse 80-65.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlights (Bol Bol dominates Syracuse ) 2018/11/16 SOT FULL ESHEET

video.title: Bol Bol dominates Syracuse on his birthday

article.headline: Bol leads No. 13 Oregon past No. 15 Syracuse in 2K Classic

images.name: Bol Bol dominates Syracuse on his birthday
images.caption: Bol Bol continues his stellar play as he scores 26 points and collects 9 rebounds and Oregon takes down Syracuse 80-65.

article.linkText: Bol leads No. 13 Oregon past No. 15 Syracuse in 2K Classic
article.story: NEW YORK -- Bol Bol had 26 points and nine rebounds, and No. 13 Oregon beat No. 15 Syracuse 80-65 in the consolation game of the 2K Classic on Friday. Payton Pritchard added 18 points for the Ducks (3-1) and Kenny Wooten had 12 in the first-ever meeting between the ACC and Pac-12 programs. Tyus Battle scored 17 points to lead the Orange (2-2), who lost for the second time in less than 24 hours. Syracuse fell to UConn 83-76 in a semifinal on Thursday night. The Orange missed 23 of 28 3-point attempts against Oregon. Elijah Hughes and Jalen Carey scored 14 points apiece for Syracuse, and Oshae Brissett had 11.

videos.headline: Investigating Boeheim's misspelled Syracuse jersey
videos.description: Fran Fraschilla hits the streets of New York City to investigate how Syracuse got Buddy Boeheim's jersey fixed after the equipment team misspelled his name in Thursday's game vs. UConn.

videos.headline: Bol Bol spins off defender for nasty dunk
videos.description: Bol Bol continues to impress as he spins off a Syracuse defender and finishes with a two-handed flush.

videos.headline: Bol Bol dominating Cuse at both ends
videos.description: Bol Bol is doing it on both ends as he rises over defenders for a putback slam, then hustles back on defense for an off-the-glass block.

videos.headline: Battle hangs for tough floater through a foul
videos.description: Tyus Battle takes the offense into his own hands as he drives past an Oregon defender and finishes with with a tough floater.

videos.headline: Wooten catches sick one-handed lob
videos.description: Payton Pritchard lobs it up to Kenny Wooten, who throws down a nasty one-handed slam over a helpless Syracuse defender.
